message.content:
{"id": "2940", "title": "Bug 2940: Export Zip - Slow update of checkboxes without busy cursor", 
"description": "The update of the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature is slow and takes about 30 seconds. During this process, a busy cursor should be displayed.", 
"OB": "When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes approximately 30 seconds for the changes to be reflected.", 
"EB": "When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes approximately 30 seconds for the changes to be reflected. Additionally, a busy cursor should be displayed during this process.", 
"SR": "1. Improve the performance of updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature so that changes are reflected more quickly.\n2. Implement a busy cursor to be shown during the update process of the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

', 'OB': 'It takes a log time ( 30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table Busy cursor should be shownNOTES: ', 'EB': 'It takes a log time ( 30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table Busy cursor should be shownNOTES: ', 'SR': ''}
